transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji, good evening sir.
Customer: Ha, good evening.
Executive: Sir, Rajiv Enterprises se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ha sir, Rajiv Enterprise se baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Mohammad Tausif baat kar raha tha, from IndiaMART se relationship manager. Kaise hain aap sir?
Customer: Ha sir, badhiya, aap bataiye sir kaise hain?
Executive: Achha hu, achha hu sir Gandhi. Services ke regarding sir abhi aapne jo hai ek concern raise kiya tha, kuch buylead ka concern face kar rahe the aap services mein. Right?
Customer: Ha, abhi wo dopahar ko madam se sath connect hua tha.
Executive: Ji, ji. Isiliye aapko call kariye ki sari cheezein unhone explain kar di hai, aap samajh gaye hain kaise kya karna hai abhi aage?
Customer: Unhone khali ye concern chase karu kar diya hai. Mera abhi buylead kyu kam aa rahi hai, kyu nahi aa rahi hai, jyada aa rahi hai wo bhi wo unhone bola ki upar se hi kam hai marketing mein isliye.
Executive: Sir, actually category mein jaise aapki category sir bahut unique category hai jismein aap deal karte hain sir. To aap bhi jante honge ki thoda sa sir ismein buylead ka flow kam hai matlab hamare paas. Jitne buyer search karte hain hum unhi ko aap tak pahuncha sakte hain. To abhi tak abhi start jo month hua hai to abhi tak 21 buyer aapki category ki hamare buylead generate hui hai. To wo sari ki sari show hue hain to unko bhi aap ek kaam kiya kijiye ki jo usko location mein India recent ka filter aap laga ke check karte raha kijiye koi bhi leads agar generate ho rahi hai usmein to kam se kam aap miss mat kiya kijiye usko.
Customer: Ha, abhi dekhte rahunga abhi jo buylead aati hai mere jo listing related to main wo lete rahunga sir.
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul. Aur aapki ek category thi Venus self-contained breathing apparatus. Kya ismein deal karte hain sir aap?
Customer: Sir usmein to buylead aati nahi hai abhi tak teen month mein wo IndiaMART mein jo account open hua hai teen month se usmein wo do teen baar wo buylead aayi thi sirf baki wo cylinder ki sirf requirement aati hai sir. To nahi deal karte hain ismein ki nahi karte hain jo abhi category maine boli aapko?
Customer: Ha, karta hu, karta hu, bilkul karta hu sir. Ji, isi wajah se buylead nahi aa rahi hai main aapko batata hu ye jo category hai aapke catalog mein added hi nahi hai sir. To aap mujhe ye bataiye sir ki isse related kaun sa product hai aapka?
Customer: Wo jo product maine list kiya hai na jo ek pura aata hai wo jo mask aata hai wo bottle aati hai wo.
Executive: Achha achha ye Drager self-contained breathing apparatus ye hai kya? Ha. Ye ye yes sir yes sir wo bhi wo main wahi main bilkul karna chahta hu par uski buylead bahut kam hai.
Executive: Are sir wo matlab kya hua tha ki starting mein matlab aapka product aapne kiya hua hai lekin IndiaMART jo aapko requirement bhejta hai sir wo category ke basis pe bhejta hai. Ismein jo category add hai wo hai self-contained breathing apparatus, theek hai?
Customer: Ha, yes sir, yes sir.
Executive: Ji, aur hum jo category jo hai aapko bata raha hu ye Venus self-contained breathing apparatus ki category hai. To ye category abhi main fir se add on kar raha hu aapke catalog mein. To aapke paas kya hoga ki is category se related jo bhi requirement hogi wo aane lagengi sir.
Customer: Ha, ha sir wo kar dijiye aap wo Drager company ka set aata hai wo mask aata hai wo sab usko mera add kar dijiye category mein aur jo cylinder hai wo to main deal karna hi chahta hu wo to kar hi raha hu abhi uski bhi buylead bahut kam ho rahi hai wo teen din mein ek ya do aise ho rahi hai.
Executive: Achha. Abhi aap mujhe ye bataiye sabse pehle ki abhi kya abhi tak kaisa response aa raha hai? Matlab abhi tak jo aapne use kiya hai sir koi deals business mila hai abhi aapko ki nahi mila hai?
Customer: Ha, ek hi ek hi order aaya hai abhi wo ek hi successfully order hai wo bhi baki to sab baat chit ho rahi hai fir wo decide karte hai nahi karte wo sir lete hai nahi lete aur se le lenge sir ye sab sab ho raha hai abhi to. Wo jo lead aate rahe to deal ki lead aati rahe to usme se ek hi successfully hoga do nahi lenge teen lead aaye to ek lenge teen nahi lenge aisa to lead jyada aaye to aisa mere ko nahi nahi baki wo.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye ek cheez aur main dekh raha tha aap kya kijiye sir sabse pehle to ye main add on kar diya hu aapke catalog mein ye category. To jis se is category se related jo bhi requirement generate hogi wo buyer aapke paas connect ho jayega aur buylead aapke paas aa jayegi. Iske alawa bhi sir bahut sari categories hai jismein ek bar mujhe discuss karwana padega aapki team ke sath ki usmein karte hain ki nahi kyunki jitni jyada category add karke rakhenge sir utna jyada aapke liye benefit hai. To aapke paas Komal ka number hai sir? Komal jisse baat hui hai?
Customer: Ha, uska number hai mere paas.
Executive: Aap na unka personal number hai ki aapka ye jis number pe call aayi thi wo hai?
Customer: Ha to unse main abhi aaj to connect hua tha abhi do teen din baad main unse fir connect karke aap unko bol dena kya karna hai kya nahi to mere ko sab samjha de aisa karo aisa.
Executive: Ha, main unse category add karwaunga main. Main ek kaam kijiyega aap jab Komal se baat kijiyega agli bar to aap bol dijiyega main Komal ka manager hi baat kar raha hu sir. To aap unse bol dijiyega ki sir ne aapko kuch category add karne ke liye bola hoga to aap mujhe related category dikha dijiye. Main unse ek bar baat bhi kar le raha hu ki agli bar jab aapse connect karegi to aapke product se related jitni bhi category hamare paas hai wo ek bar discuss kar legi aapse aur uske baad se main update karte hu. Connect kar lijiyega parso Wednesday ko connect.
Executive: Ha, bilkul jab bhi aap free rahiye aap ek bar connect kar lijiyega. Group create kiya unhone WhatsApp pe message kiya aapko?
Customer: Ha, unko sir Komal madam ko bol dijiye kal connect karenge aur kal wo main free rahunga dopahar ke lunch ke baad.
Executive: Theek hai. WhatsApp group create kiya hai Komal ne sir aapke paas? WhatsApp group mein add hue hain aap?
Customer: Ha, unhone mere ko message to kiya hai.
Executive: WhatsApp pe kiya hai?
Customer: Ha, WhatsApp pe message kiya unhone.
Executive: Theek hai, aap bhi aap jaise hi aap free hoiyega aap ek bar unko connect kar lijiyega baki main bhi unko bol deta hu connect karne ke liye aapko.
Customer: Ha, ha theek hai aap unko sab samajh samjha dijiyega wo mere ko sab bol denge wo kya karna hai kya nahi wo.
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul sir.
Customer: Okay, thank you sir. Aap baat kar lena wo fir kya karna hai kya add karna hai wo sab. Main unko ha unko main bata dunga. Baki sir aapke aapka concern close kar raha hu aapke paas chota sa ek feedback jayega mail mein to satisfied mark kar dijiyega sir.
Customer: Ha, ha sir abhi kar deta hu, thank you sir.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Thank you so much for your time.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Rajiv Enterprises se abhi baat hui hai to kya kya karna hai jitni bhi category hai ek bar discuss kar lena sir ke sath. Kal ek bar connect kar lena WhatsApp pe time de dena sari category discuss kar lena aur hamare IndiaMART ke portal pe jo category available hai jo sabse related hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing issues with buylead generation.

- Buyleads are less for self-contained breathing apparatus.

- Cylinder buyleads are also very low.



Resolution:

- Executive added Venus self-contained breathing apparatus category.

- Executive will ask Komal to discuss categories with customer.

- Executive will inform Komal to connect with customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect with Komal.

- Customer to provide feedback in the mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, subscription, catalog
